message.email: The {#field} field must be a valid email
message.min: The {#field} field value cannot be less than:{min}
message.max: The {#field} field value cannot be greater than:{max}
message.number: The {#field} field can only contain numbers
message.integer: The {#field} field is not an integer
message.float: The {#field} field is not a floating point number
message.alpha: The {#field} field may only contain alphabetic characters
message.alpha_num: The {#field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
message.alpha_spaces: The {#field} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
message.url: The {#field} field not a qualified URL
